data.title: NEW DEVELOPMENTS
data.meta_description:
If you're looking for a brand new apartment in Jerusalem and the surrounding area , we have some great new developments for you! 
In addition, new apartments in Efrat, Gush Etzion, Tel Aviv - Jaffa, Netanya, Ra'anana, Beit Shemesh, Mevsaret and more
data.text:
Experience luxury and history in the heart of old Katamon with New House Boutique Collection. Enjoy a communal atmosphere near educational centers, cultural sites, and the charm of old Katamon. Perfect for families, it harmonizes history with modern luxury.

​

4-room apartments| 5-room apartments |

6-room apartments

An exclusive project built in the heart of Jerusalem

A combination of Nachlaot’s picturesque alleys and Jerusalem’s green lungs, Sacher Park on the other, created the best location in town.

​

2-room apartments| 3-room apartments |

4-room apartments

In the heart of the city of Efrat, private villas, and semi-detached homes with elevator, spacious gardens, and heated pools.

Extremely high specification and standards. In front of a pastoral landscape.

The Nahala project is located in front of Sacher Park, Jerusalem. Overlooking the wonderful garden, the Supreme Court and the Knesset.

​

Prestigious project, in a unique location! For customers from Israel and abroad.

​

There are only 10 apartments left!

Outstanding and exclusive project located in the much sought-after Baka neighborhood.

The project offers a choice of spacious 4- and 5-room apartments as well as magnificent penthouses with a private pool.

The building has an ornate lobby which was planned and designed by one of the leading architectural firms.

THE PERFECT NEIGHBORHOOD IN THE PERFECT LOCATION.

Just a few minutes’ walk takes you to the picturesque Nachlaot neighborhood, the garden district of Rehavia, the historic Old City, and the sprawling shopping and entertainment complex that is Mahane Yehuda market.

​

2-room apartments | 3-room apartments | 4-room apartments | 5-room apartments

The building has only 7 floors and 23 apartments, which were designed to provide a perfect living experience with premium quality specifications.

You can choose from apartments in a variety of sizes: luxurious 4,3-room boutique apartments with sun terraces, mini-penthouses, spectacular penthouses and a garden apartment. The design of the building sets a luxurious design standard: floor-ceiling curtain walls, extra wide window openings, luxurious wooden louvers in a European design, balconies with a glass railing, covered with a DECK and large interior spaces.
